DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial examine metabolic behavioral effect positive energy balance induce add food usual level activity . It hypothesize : 1 ) food intake differ significantly 2 day positive energy balance induce high carbohydrate vs. high fat diet diet low energy density , 2 ) food intake higher positive energy balance induce high fat/high energy dense diet vs. high fat/low energy dense diet .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose trial examine metabolic behavioral effect positive energy balance induce add food usual level activity . During study , induce positive energy balance two day increase food intake 140 % baseline energy requirement keep energy expenditure constant . The following three diet , vary dietary fat energy density ( kcal/g ) , use induce positive energy balance within subject cross design : 1 ) high fat/high energy density , 2 ) high fat/low energy density , 3 ) high carbohydrate/low energy density . Food intake activity measure 4 day diet quantify response positive energy balance manipulation dietary fat energy density .
DOC.criteria: You age 18 50 , inclusive , male age 18 45 , inclusive , female . Your body mass index ( BMI ) 20 40 kg/mÂ² , inclusive . For female , regular menstrual period , less 28 day cycle . Monophasic birth control pill , copper IUD , Ortho Evra patch , NuvaRing complete hysterectomy also acceptable . You chronic disease affect body weight , appetite , metabolism , diabetes cardiovascular disease . You irregular menstrual cycle , partial hysterectomy ( still maintain ovary ) , use IUD make copper . You use prescription overthecounter medication herbal product affect metabolism body weight ( e.g . weight loss medication sibutramine , orlistat ) . You use birth control pill n't monophasic receive DeproProvera injection . You barrier complete study , work family commitment . You symptoms depression excessive dietary restraint . You use tobacco product . You exercise 1 hour per day , 5 day per week .
